biotools.summary: Web based platform for comparative analyses of human miRNA functions. It includes two programs: miRmut2GO (Functional analysis of genetic and somatic mutations in microRNAs) and miRpair2GO (Comparative functional analysis for microRNA pairs).

bioschemas.name: miR2GO
bioschemas.summary: Web based platform for comparative analyses of human miRNA functions. It includes two programs: miRmut2GO (Functional analysis of genetic and somatic mutations in microRNAs) and miRpair2GO (Comparative functional analysis for microRNA pairs).
